TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationDeployment extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持以编程方式更新当前部署，以及处理文件的按需下载。

span.span: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以配置你[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序检查更新并安装它们自动通过`subscription`部署清单的元素。You can configure your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to check for updates and install them automatically through the `subscription` element of the deployment manifest. 某些应用程序，但是，需要更好地控制他们的更新。Some applications, however, need finer control over their updates. 您可能想要以编程方式，安装所需的更新，并提示用户安装在方便的可选更新。You may want to install required updates programmatically, and prompt users to install optional updates at their convenience. 通过关闭部署清单中的订阅更新，可能需要完全控制应用程序的更新策略。By turning off subscription updates in the deployment manifest, you can take complete control of your application's update policies. 或者，可以结合使用自动订阅，它使[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]定期更新应用程序，但使用他们发布后不久下载关键更新。Alternatively, you can use automatic subscription in conjunction with , which enables [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] to update the application periodically, but uses to download critical updates shortly after they are released. 你可以测试你的部署使用有可用的更新是否或方法; 后, 一种方法将引发在成功完成的事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or the method; the latter method raises the event on successful completion. 返回有关此更新，例如其版本号以及它是否为当前用户所需的更新的重要信息。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，你可以通过安装它或; 后一种方法将引发后更新的安装已完成事件。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is complete. 对于大型更新，可以接收通过进度通知和事件，并使用中的信息以通知用户下载状态。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 此外可以使用下载大型文件和按需程序集。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 这些文件必须标记为"可选"中部署的应用程序清单，以便它们不会在安装过程中下载。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest so that they are not downloaded during installation. 可以通过在应用程序的持续时间下载文件随时或方法。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or the method. 通过提供的事件处理程序被加载到内存之前，您可以下载的程序集上的事件类。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). > [!NOTE] > 如果更新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序中运行应用程序时，用户将不看到更新，直到你调用方法的，这将关闭当前正在运行的应用程序实例并立即重新启动它。If you update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application while the application is running, the user will not see the updates until you call the method of the , which will close the current running instance of the application and immediately restart it. 没有公共构造函数;获取内的类的实例[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序通过属性。 has no public constructor; you obtain instances of the class within a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application through the property. 您使用属性以验证当前应用程序是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序。You use the property to verify that the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. 检查更新和下载支持文件以异步方式更新使用新的[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，其公开为类事件的完成回调。 supports checking for updates and downloading updated files asynchronously by using the new [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), which exposes completion callbacks as class events. 启动和管理的线程，并返回正确的 UI 线程上调用你的应用程序。 starts and manages the threads for you, and calls your application back on the correct UI thread. 通过此类，可以更新而不需要锁定应用程序，以便用户可以继续工作时安装更新。Through this class, you can update without locking up the application, so that the user can continue working while the update installs. 如果发生更新时，用户必须停止所有工作，请考虑改为使用同步方法。If the user must stop all work while an update takes place, consider using the synchronous methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 执行异步更新，则要求您的应用程序导入这两和命名空间。Performing asynchronous updates requires that your application import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有新的更新可用;如果所需的更新可用，该代码示例将以异步方式安装此更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, the code example installs the update asynchronously. 应将此代码添加到包含窗体名为`downloadStatus`。This code should be added to a form that contains a named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法进行比较，请参阅部署清单中指定的版本与当前安装的部署的版本。The method compares the version of the currently installed deployment with the version specified in the deployment manifest found at . 如果在服务器上的版本是已安装的版本不同，它将返回`true`。If the version on the server is different from the installed version, it returns `true`. 此方法将阻塞，直到完成该检查。This method will block until the check has completed. 若要以异步方式检查更新，请使用方法相反。To check for an update asynchronously, use the method instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用，且用户选择不安装它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]会提示有可用的更新在下次运行应用程序的用户。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 没有方法来禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序所需的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]无提示安装。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新;如果找到一个对象，它将安装它以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if one is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将立即返回，启动单独的线程来下载更新的应用程序。 returns immediately and starts a separate thread for downloading the updated application. 当方法完成或被取消时，将引发事件。When the method completes or is canceled, it raises the event. 可以使用以确定是否已取消此操作，或如果更新的过程中引发了异常，此事件处理程序中。You can use in this event handler to determine whether the operation was canceled, or if an exception was raised during update. 您可以通过调用取消异步更新。You can cancel an asynchronous update by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用，且用户选择不安装它，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]会提示有可用的更新在下次运行应用程序的用户。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 没有方法来禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序所需的更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]无提示安装。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的示例以异步方式检查更新和安装更新，如果存在。The following example checks for an update asynchronously, and installs the update if one exists. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消异步更新检查。

span.span: Cancels the asynchronous update check.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来取消与启动的更新检查方法。Use this method to cancel an update check initiated with the method. 此方法不会取消任何后台更新，可能已在进行，例如订阅的一部分启动的更新。This method will not cancel any background update that may already be in progress, such as an update started as part of a subscription. 有关订阅的详细信息，请参阅[选择 ClickOnce 更新策略](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc)。For more information about subscriptions, see [Choosing a ClickOnce Update Strategy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将告诉您，在其他内容、 的更新版本、 大有更新，和可用的更新是必需还是可选。The class will tell you, among other things, the version of the update, how large the update is, and whether the available update is required or optional. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来决定是否要求用户安装可用的应用程序更新。The following code example uses to decide whether to ask the user to install the available application update. 如果更新是强制性的升级，事件处理程序不会提示用户。If the update is a mandatory upgrade, the event handler does not prompt the user. 该示例需要部署包含的 Windows 窗体应用程序控件，并且此控件包含控件命名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能创建的实例直接在你的应用程序; 必须检索有效的实例通过属性。You cannot create instances of directly in your application; you must retrieve a valid instance through the property. 静态属性是在使用部署的应用程序只能从有效[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The static property is valid only from within an application that was deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 尝试从非调用此属性[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序将引发异常。Attempts to call this property from non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications will throw an exception. 如果你正在开发的应用程序可能会或不可能通过使用部署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用属性来测试是否为当前程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序。If you are developing an application that may or may not be deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the property to test whether the current program is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索和检查，以确定是否已在过去三天中更新应用程序。The following code example retrieves and checks to determine whether the application has been updated in the past three days. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将不同于如果已安装新更新，但尚未调用。 will differ from if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called . 如果部署清单配置为执行自动更新，您可以比较这两个值以确定如果应重新启动该应用程序。If the deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine if you should restart the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个方法，用于确定是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]已更新应用程序。The following code example defines a method that determines whether [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has updated the application. files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them. 例如，某些用户可能需要使用其他用户可能无法调用它时每天都在应用程序中包含的数据分析包。For example, certain users may need to use a data analysis package included in your application on a daily basis, while other users may never invoke it. 若要使用已下载的程序集，将附加到的事件侦听器上的事件。To use an assembly you have downloaded with , you attach an event listener to the event on the . 有关示例，请参阅 =[演练： 使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 使用设计器按需下载程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For 所有文件都下载到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序缓存中，因此独立于应用程序的当前版本。All files are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application cache and are therefore isolated to the current version of the application. 假设某个应用程序下载的文件组后，该用户安装的新版本的应用程序，但稍后又还原为以前版本的应用程序。Let's say that after an application downloads a file group, the user installs a new version of the application, but later reverts to the previous version of the application. 在这种情况下上, 一版本仍将最初下载的文件的副本。In this case, the previous version will still have the copies of the files it originally downloaded. 有关访问数据文件的详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information about accessing data files, see application running with restricted permission. 但是，如果您尝试进行动态加载程序集，则你的应用程序需要完全信任。However, if you attempt to load assemblies dynamically, your application will require full trust. 当前不支持按需下载数据文件。On-demand downloading of data files is currently not supported. 你的应用程序不会响应用户输入，直到方法返回。Your application will not be responsive to user input until the method returns. remarks.format: ## Remarks 主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 它是线程安全地调用直接在此回调中的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件。It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback. 检查属性的提供给此回调。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`，则下载已成功; 如果不是`null`、 安装未成功，并且你可以找到有关通过安装失败的详细信息属性。If this property is `null`, the download was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about the installation failure through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例下载在后台的帮助文件的组。The following code example downloads a group of Help files in the background. 该示例需要部署包含的 Windows 窗体应用程序控件，并且此控件包含控件命名为`downloadStatus`...The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`.. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有任何安全请求的部分受信任的应用程序中的工作原理。 works in a partially trusted application without any security demands. 当你更新应用程序时[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将按需数据的任何文件从以前的版本复制到新版本的数据目录。When you update an application, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] copies any on-demand data files from the previous version into the new version's data directory. 如果下载这些文件的新版本，则应删除任何你想要保留从旧版本并将其移到新版本的数据。If you download a new version of these files, you should remove any data you want to keep from the old version and move it into the new version. ## Examples 下面的代码示例下载中的所有文件`HelpFiles`组到磁盘。The following code example downloads all of the files in the `HelpFiles` group to disk. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以确定是否需要执行第一次运行应用程序的任何一次性初始化操作。Use to determine whether you need to perform any one-time initialization operations the first time your application runs. 不要假定设置的`true`指示应用程序的此实例是第一个要向用户显示其用户界面。Do not assume that a setting of `true` indicates that this instance of an application is the first one to show its user interface to the user. 由于在系统安排进程的方式，应用程序的一个实例可能具有其属性设置为`true`，但另一个实例可能是第一个要在屏幕上呈现。Due to the way the system schedules processes, one instance of the application may have its property set to `true`, but another instance may be the first to render on the screen. 每当用户从一个版本升级到下一步是重置此属性的值。The value of this property is reset whenever the user upgrades from one version to the next. 如果你想要执行的操作仅应对第一个时间的任何版本运行该应用程序，你将需要执行其他测试，如检查是否存在文件创建第一次或存储标志使用**应用程序设置**。If you want to perform an operation only the very first time any version of the application is run, you will need to perform an additional test, such as checking for the existence of a file you created the first time, or storing a flag using **Application Settings**. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来确定是否要检查的文件组的更新`HelpFiles`。The following code example uses to decide whether to check for an update to the file group `HelpFiles`. 如果已更新一个或多个文件，则会调用以获取新版本。If one or more of the files have been updated, it calls to obtain the new versions. [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可以配置为订阅更新。A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can be configured for subscription updates. 在此方案中，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]轮询在部署清单中定义的时间间隔自动应用程序的部署位置，并确定是否有可用更新。In this scenario, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] polls an application's deployment location automatically at intervals defined in the deployment manifest, and determines whether there is an update available. 返回上次更新检查而不考虑它是否已启动订阅或显式检查使用的时间， ， ， ，或方法。 returns the time of the last update check regardless of whether it was initiated by a subscription or by an explicit check using the , , , , or method. 如果安装应用程序后，执行更新检查返回的安装时间。If no update check has been performed since the application was installed, returns the installation time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序已选中在过去三天中的可用更新。The following code example checks whether a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has been checked for available updates in the past three days. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序被视为发布到指定的位置的应用程序的新版本时更新，应用程序的部署清单中的版本号为当前大于应用程序的版本号用户的计算机上安装。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 调用会阻塞，直到下载到客户端计算机更新并将其安装到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]缓存; 在此期间，应用程序不会响应用户。The call will block until the update has been downloaded to the client computer and installed into the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] cache; during this time, the application will not be responsive to the user. 如果你想要维护应用程序响应能力或在下载时，使用显示的进度报告方法相反。If you want to maintain application responsiveness or display a progress report during download, use the method instead. 下载所有未标记为"可选"应用程序清单中的文件。 downloads all of the files that are not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 可以使用下载可选文件按需或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已将更新应用程序会自动调用时方法; 如果发生这种情况，调用此方法将引发。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果已在你的部署中更新一个或多个文件，但不是刷新应用程序清单中，你将收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下，重新部署你[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可解决此问题。Most of the time, redeploying your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application solves this problem. 如果在部署清单或应用程序清单上的公共密钥签名无效或缺失，也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会请求在本地计算机上的信任级别比应用程序的以前版本高。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单，以确定它是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]停止安装，且会引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 方法永远不会显示一个提示，询问用户是否要授予应用程序的权限运行。The method will never display a prompt asking the user whether they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新;如果有可用的更新，，安装该解决方案以同步方式。The following code example checks for an application update; if an update is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 开始异步下载和安装此应用程序的最新版本。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序被视为发布到指定的位置的应用程序的新版本时更新，应用程序的部署清单中的版本号为当前大于应用程序的版本号用户的计算机上安装。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 在下载更新，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将引发上主应用程序线程来通知你下载的状态事件处理程序。While downloading the update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event handler on the main application thread to inform you of the status of the download. 当异步更新完成或遇到了异常[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将引发主应用程序线程上的事件。When the asynchronous update finishes or encounters an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event on the main application thread. 检查提供给此事件以确定更新是否成功。Examine the supplied to this event to determine whether the update succeeded. 如果引发异常，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]调用，并设置属性对引发的异常。If throws an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] calls and sets the property of to the exception that was thrown. 将下载在部署中未标记为"可选"应用程序清单中的所有文件。 will download all files in a deployment not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 可以使用下载可选文件按需或方法。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 可能已将更新应用程序会自动调用时方法; 如果发生这种情况，调用此方法将引发。 may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果已在你的部署中更新一个或多个文件，但不是刷新应用程序清单中，你将收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下，重新生成应用程序清单可解决此问题。Most of the time, rebuilding your application manifest solves this problem. 如果在部署清单或应用程序清单上的公共密钥签名无效或缺失，也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会请求在本地计算机上的信任级别比应用程序的以前版本高。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单，以确定它是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]停止安装，且会引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 将永远不会显示一个提示，询问用户他们想要授予应用程序的权限运行。 will never display a prompt asking the user if they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定新的更新在应用程序加载时; 是否可用如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装此更新。The following code example determines whether a new update is available at application load time; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例需要部署包含的 Windows 窗体应用程序控件，并且此控件包含控件命名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has finished upgrading the application as the result of a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 您可能会调用直接在此回调中的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件而不会触发异常。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. 检查属性的提供给此回调。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`，安装是否成功; 如果不是`null`，安装未成功，并且可以找到有关通过此安装失败的详细信息属性。If this property is `null`, the installation was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about this installation failure through the property. 一旦已下载更新，你将需要调用方法使用较新版本的应用程序。Once the update has been downloaded, you will need to call the method on the to use the newer version of the application. 如果更新的安装已取消通过调用，则的属性类将为`true`。If the installation of the update was canceled by a call to , the property of the class will be `true`. 若要使用此事件处理程序，你的应用程序必须同时导入和命名空间。To use this event handler, your application must import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有新的更新可用;如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装此更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例需要部署包含的 Windows 窗体应用程序控件，并且此控件包含控件命名为`downloadStatus`。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于如果已安装新更新但尚未调用上。 differs from if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called on the . 如果应用程序的部署清单配置为执行自动更新，您可以比较这两个值以确定是否应重新启动该应用程序。If the application's deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine whether you should restart the application. 如果尚未更新应用程序，返回相同的值。If the application has not been updated, returns the same value as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个方法，用于确定是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]已更新应用程序。The following code example defines a method that determines whether [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has updated the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 您可能会调用直接在此回调中的应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件而不会触发异常。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定在应用程序加载时，是否有新的更新可用;如果所需的更新可用，它以异步方式安装此更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously.
